server.universe
Interface Entity

All Known Implementing Classes:
Armor, Book, Bunny, Cannon, CheapTreat, Cloth, Creature, Deer, FancyTreat, Hydes, ICritter, ICritterCat, ICritterDog, ICritterPenguin, Item, Key, Kitten, LargePotion, Merchant, MOB, Player, Room, RoomGiftMob, RoomThiefMob, SmallPotion, Spear, SteelMesh, Sword, Troll, Weapon
public interface Entity

Entity represents something in the Universe. All entities have a name and a description. Thus, all entities can be looked at and such.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getDescription()
          Return a description of the entity.
 java.lang.String getName()
          Return the name of the entity.
 

Method Detail

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Return the name of the entity. Names are not necessarily unique. Name should be short (one word no spaces?). They should be singular nouns.

Returns:
the name of the entity.

getDescription

java.lang.String getDescription()
Return a description of the entity. This should be a string (about 1-4 sentences?) describing what the thing is and what it looks like.

Returns:
the name of the entity.
